Package org.apache.beam.runners.spark

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EvaluationResult
    Interface for retrieving the result(s) of running a pipeline.
    SparkPipelineOptions
    Spark runner pipeline options.
    SparkStreamingPipelineOptions
    Options used to configure Spark streaming.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SparkPipelineRunner
    The SparkPipelineRunner translate operations defined on a pipeline to a representation executable by Spark, and then submitting the job to Spark to be executed.
    SparkPipelineRunner.Evaluator
    Evaluator on the pipeline.
    SparkRunnerRegistrar
    Contains the PipelineRunnerRegistrar and PipelineOptionsRegistrar for the SparkPipelineRunner.
    SparkRunnerRegistrar.Options
    Registers the SparkPipelineOptions and SparkStreamingPipelineOptions.
    SparkRunnerRegistrar.Runner
    Registers the SparkPipelineRunner.
